data.message: Nice bro but sign the damn things man

replies.message: Why do you want a random guy to sign them
So you are saying that this is not Eminem? 😂

Na man it's just a fan page I've order from them they messed my order up.and they never have like selfies of him so that gives it away.you just got to look at it from that perspective and see it's a admin who runs this site.never any quotes from him etc.sorry I wish it was I love shady just as much as the next stan.but it is what it is.
Believing in both things are wrong.. the truth is we dont know what Em does in his day.. he can be around or not.. he can read us, or not. We just dont know and that is what it is.
He could be sitting in a car next to me on i94,  in Detroit I would never know !
If you listened to one of his songs he says he doesn't even understand social media.... I wouldn't be surprised if it was Paul running the page the bastard posts non stop on Twitter
Anton Timo he says he avoids it, not that he doesnt understand it
he said he dont like computers and electronics like that in many interviews so im assuming its somone else on this page but im sure he has to approve any post that go out
No I'm telling you he ain't on this site think what you want I've talked to the person who runs this site before
Fuck the box , the shoes need to be signed 😂
